codeCapture.background.markdownDescription: Background color of the snippet's container. Can be any valid value of the CSS property `background`.

codeCapture.shadow.markdownDescription: Shadow of the snippet node. Can be any valid value of the CSS property `box-shadow`. Ignored if `#codeCapture.target#` is `snippet`.

codeCapture.padding.markdownDescription: amount of space reserved around the snippet. Ignored if `#codeCapture.target#` is `snippet`.

markdownEnumDescriptions: Shoot the snippet with padding for `#codeCapture.shadow#`.
Shoot the snippet on it's own.

codeCapture.windowTitle.description: Display a title at the top of the snippet. Can be overridden by clicking the top of the snippet preview.

codeCapture.autoSave.description: Automatically save snippet instead of displaying save dialog.

codeCapture.closeOnSave.description: Close panel after saving a snippet.

codeCapture.closeOnSaveDelay.markdownDescription: Time (in miliseconds) before the capture window closes. Only applies when `#codeCapture.closeOnSave#` is `true`.
